Name: americasarmy-pg
Overview: This Docker will download and install SteamCMD. It will also install America's Army: Proving Grounds and run it.

UDP1 - Game Port.Name: UDP1 - Game Port
UDP1 - Game Port.Description: UDP Gameport (if you need another port, please delete this entry and create a new UDP Port with the required port number, also don't forget to change the port number at the Game Parameters)

UDP2 - Game Port.Name: UDP2 - Game Port
UDP2 - Game Port.Description: UDP Gameport (if you need another port, please delete this entry and create a new UDP Port with the required port number, also don't forget to change the port number at the Game Parameters)

UDP3 - Steam Query Port.Name: UDP3 - Steam Query Port
UDP3 - Steam Query Port.Description: UDP Queryport (if you need another port, please delete this entry and create a new UDP Port with the required port number, also don't forget to click an 'Show more settings ...' and change the port number

GAME_ID.Name: GAME_ID
GAME_ID.Description:
The GAME_ID that the container download at startup.
If you want to install a static or beta version of the game change the value to: '203300 -beta YOURBRANCH' (without quotes, replace YOURBRANCH with the branch or version you want to install).

Game Parameters.Name: Game Parameters
Game Parameters.Description: Enter your start up commands for the server.

Steam-Username.Name: Steam-Username
Steam-Username.Description: Your Steam username goes here if you want to install a game that needs a valid account, otherwise leave it blank (ATTENTION: You have to disable Steam Guard).

Validate Installation.Name: Validate Installation
Validate Installation.Description: Set the Variable to 'true' if you want to validate the installation otherwise leave it blank.

Steam-Password.Name: Steam-Password
Steam-Password.Description: Your Steam password goes here if you want to install a game that needs a valid account, otherwise leave it blank (ATTENTION: You have to disable Steam Guard).
